Background.data_info: For those with mental health being high (A=1), the probability of humidity level being high (C=1) is 0.7003. The probability of mental health being low (A=0) and humidity level being low (C=0) is 0.1574. The probability of mental health being high (A=1) and humidity level being high (C=1) is 0.5617.

Questions.Instruction: Consider the probability of sufficiency (PS) of mental health on humidity level.
Questions.Question: Given that mental health was low and humidity level was low, what is the upper bound of the probability that humidity level would have been high if the mental health had been high?

Reason.Step 1:
Calculate P(C=1|do(A=1))
P(C=1|do(A=1))=P(C=1|A=1)=0.7003
